name: Port
description:
This is a simply 3D platformer game made in Unity 3D. Use your Port balls to traverse the platforms to get to the target and try and see how few times you need to port to get to the end. Left click charges your port launcher releasing fires it. Right click teleports you to your port ball. But if you cant seem to make the leep use your gravity modifiers by selecting it using your mouse wheel.

Good luck Have fun!
